panels.description: Indicates if the link is operational.
panels.title: LINK STATE

panels.description: Time since the device was restarted.
System is stable when current value is between low and high warning/alarm thresholds.

Time since the CPE first both successfully established an IP-layer network connection and acquired an absolute time reference using NTP or equivalent over that network connection. The CPE MAY reset this date after a factory reset.
Indicates the status of the various LAN interfaces and the device count, active and inactive, for each interface. The device counts include both DHCP and static clients.
panels.title: INTERFACE CLIENTS
